basic.blooming: Flowering period June-September, fruiting period July-November
basic.color: Flower color yellow white , fruit color dark black

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes sunshine, put in sunny places, avoid strong sunlight in summer at noon
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead and pest branches timely
